void TechnoExt::EjectPassengers ( TechnoClass *  pThis,
signed short  howMany 
) [static]

This function ejects a given number of passengers from the passed transporter.

Parameters:
pThis Pointer to the transporter
howMany How many passengers to eject - pass negative number for "all"
Author:
Renegade
Date:
27.05.2010 
00132                                                                         {
00133         if(howMany == 0 || !pThis->Passengers.NumPassengers) {
00134                 return;
00135         }
00136 
00137         short limit = (howMany < 0 || howMany > pThis->Passengers.NumPassengers) ? pThis->Passengers.NumPassengers : howMany;
00138 
00139         for(short i = 0; (i < limit) && pThis->Passengers.FirstPassenger; ++i) {
00140                 CoordStruct destination;
00141                 TechnoExt::GetPutLocation(pThis->Location, destination);
00142 
00143                 FootClass *passenger = pThis->Passengers.RemoveFirstPassenger();
00144                 passenger->Put(&destination, ScenarioClass::Instance->Random.RandomRanged(0, 7));
00145         }
00146         return;
00147 }

void TechnoExt::GetPutLocation ( CoordStruct const &  current,
CoordStruct &  target 
) [static]

This function drops the coordinates of an infantry subposition into the target parameter. Could probably work for vehicles as well, though they'd be off-center.

Parameters:
current The current position of the transporter, the starting point to look from
target A CoordStruct to save the finally computed position to
Author:
Renegade
Date:
27.05.2010 
00159                                                                               {
00160         // this whole thing does not at all account for cells which are completely occupied.
00161         CoordStruct tmpLoc = current;
00162         CellStruct tmpCoords = CellSpread::GetCell(ScenarioClass::Instance->Random.RandomRanged(0, 7));
00163 
00164         tmpLoc.X += tmpCoords.X * 128;
00165         tmpLoc.Y += tmpCoords.Y * 128;
00166 
00167         CellClass * tmpCell = MapClass::Instance->GetCellAt(&tmpLoc);
00168 
00169         tmpCell->FindInfantrySubposition(&target, &tmpLoc, 0, 0, 0);
00170 
00171         target.Z = current.Z;
00172         return;
00173 }

00032         // checks if Crewed=yes is set and there is a chance pilots survive, and, if yes...
00033         // ...attempts to spawn one Survivors_PilotCount times
00034         if(Type->Crewed && chance) {

00045                                         tmpLoc.X += tmpCoords.X * 144;

00056                                                 GAME_DEALLOC(Pilot);
00057                                         }
00058                                 }
00059                         }
00060                 }
00061         }
00062 
00063         chance = pData->Survivors_PassengerChance.BindTo(pThis)->Get();
00064 
00065         while(pThis->Passengers.FirstPassenger) {
00066                 bool toDelete = 1;
00067                 FootClass *passenger = pThis->Passengers.RemoveFirstPassenger();
00068                 bool toSpawn = false;
00069                 if(chance > 0) {
00070                         toSpawn = ScenarioClass::Instance->Random.RandomRanged(1, 100) <= chance;
00071                 } else if(chance == -1 && pThis->WhatAmI() == abs_Unit) {
00072                         int occupation = passenger->IsCellOccupied(pThis->GetCell(), -1, -1, 0, 1);
00073                         toSpawn = (occupation == 0 || occupation == 2);
00074                 }
00075                 if(toSpawn) {
00076                         CoordStruct destLoc, tmpLoc = loc;
00077                         CellStruct tmpCoords = CellSpread::GetCell(ScenarioClass::Instance->Random.RandomRanged(0, 7));
00078 
00079                         tmpLoc.X += tmpCoords.X * 128;
00080                         tmpLoc.Y += tmpCoords.Y * 128;
00081

00083 
00084                         tmpCell->FindInfantrySubposition(&destLoc, &tmpLoc, 0, 0, 0);
00085 
00086                         destLoc.Z = loc.Z;
00087 
00088                         toDelete = !TechnoExt::EjectSurvivor(passenger, &destLoc, Select);
00089                 }
00090                 if(toDelete) {
00091                         passenger->RegisterDestruction(pKiller); //(TechnoClass *)R->get_StackVar32(0x54));
00092                         passenger->UnInit();
00093                 }
00094         }
00095 
00096         pSelfData->Survivors_Done = 1;
00097 }

void TechnoExt::StopDraining ( TechnoClass *  Drainer,
TechnoClass *  Drainee 
) [static]

Breaks the link between DrainTarget and DrainingMe.

The links between the drainer and its victim are removed and the draining animation is no longer played.

Parameters:
Drainer The Techno that drains power or credits.
Drainee The Techno that power or credits get gets drained from.
Author:
AlexB
Date:
2010-04-27 
00186                                                                        {
00187         // fill the gaps
00188         if(Drainer && !Drainee)
00189                 Drainee = Drainer->DrainTarget;
00190 
00191         if(!Drainer && Drainee)
00192                 Drainer = Drainee->DrainingMe;
00193 
00194         // sanity check, then end draining.
00195         if(Drainer && Drainee) {
00196                 // stop the animation.
00197                 if (Drainer->DrainAnim) {
00198                         Drainer->DrainAnim->UnInit();
00199                         Drainer->DrainAnim = NULL;
00200                 }
00201 
00202                 // remove links.
00203                 Drainee->DrainingMe = NULL;
00204                 Drainer->DrainTarget = NULL;
00205 
00206                 // tell the game to recheck the drained
00207                 // player's tech level.
00208                 if (Drainee->Owner) {
00209                         Drainee->Owner->ShouldRecheckTechTree = true;
00210                 }
00211         }
00212 }
